alert.note: Alert for St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 5:33PM EDT until July 20 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ST. CLAIR COUNTY... At 533 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Port Huron, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Port Huron and Lakeport around 540 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Fort Gratiot, North Street, Avoca, Blaine, Goodells, Smiths Creek, Ruby and Wadhams. People attending Goodells County Park should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
